022import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertEquals;
023import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertFalse;
024import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertNotNull;
025import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.assertTrue;

043import static org.mockito.Mockito.mock;
044import static org.mockito.Mockito.when;
045
046import java.lang.reflect.Method;
047import java.util.List;
048
049import org.apache.commons.configuration2.Configuration;
050import org.apache.fulcrum.factory.FactoryService;
051import org.apache.fulcrum.security.UserManager;
052import org.apache.fulcrum.security.entity.Role;
053import org.apache.fulcrum.security.model.turbine.TurbineAccessControlList;
054import org.apache.turbine.annotation.AnnotationProcessor.ConditionType;
055import org.apache.turbine.modules.Screen;
056import org.apache.turbine.modules.ScreenLoader;
057import org.apache.turbine.services.assemblerbroker.AssemblerBrokerService;
058import org.apache.turbine.services.localization.LocalizationTool;
059import org.apache.turbine.services.security.SecurityService;
060import org.apache.turbine.util.RunData;
061import org.apache.turbine.util.TurbineConfig;
062import org.apache.turbine.util.TurbineException;
063import org.junit.jupiter.api.AfterAll;
064import org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeAll;
065import org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeEach;
066import org.junit.jupiter.api.Tag;
067import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
068
069/**
070 * Tests the various annotations
071 *
072 * @author <a href="mailto:tv@apache.org">Thomas Vandahl</a>
073 */
074public class AnnotationProcessorTest
075{
076    private static TurbineConfig tc;
077
078    @TurbineConfiguration
079    private Configuration completeConfiguration = null;
080
081    @TurbineConfiguration("serverdata.default")
082    private Configuration serverdataDefaultConfiguration = null;
083
084    @TurbineConfiguration("module.cache")
085    private boolean moduleCache = true;
086
087    @TurbineConfiguration("action.cache.size")
088    private int actionCacheSize = 0;
089
090    @TurbineConfiguration("template.homepage")
091    private String templateHomepage;
092
093    @TurbineConfiguration("module.packages")
094    private List<String> modulePackages;
095
096    @TurbineConfiguration("does.not.exist")
097    private long notModified = 1;
098
099    @TurbineLoader(Screen.class)
100    private ScreenLoader screenLoader;
101
102    @TurbineService
103    private AssemblerBrokerService asb;
104    
105    /** a Fulcrum userManager */
106    @TurbineService
107    private UserManager userManager;
108    
109    @TurbineService
110    private SecurityService security;
111
112    @TurbineService
113    private FactoryService factory;
114    
115    @TurbineTool(LocalizationTool.class)
116    private LocalizationTool lt;
117
118    @BeforeAll
119    public static void init() throws Exception
120    {
121        tc = new TurbineConfig(".", "/conf/test/CompleteTurbineResources.properties");
122        tc.initialize();
123    }
124
125    @AfterAll
126    public static void destroy()
127        throws Exception
128    {
129        tc.dispose();
130    }
131
132    @BeforeEach
133    public void setUpBefore() throws Exception
134    {
135        // do nothing
136    }
137
138    @Test
139    public void testProcess() throws Exception
140    {
141        AnnotationProcessor.process(this);
142
143        assertNotNull(completeConfiguration);
144        assertFalse(completeConfiguration.getBoolean("module.cache", true));
145
146        assertNotNull(serverdataDefaultConfiguration);
147        assertEquals(80, serverdataDefaultConfiguration.getInt("serverPort"));
148
149        assertFalse(moduleCache);
150        assertEquals(20, actionCacheSize);
151        assertEquals("Index.vm", templateHomepage);
152        assertNotNull(modulePackages);
153        assertEquals(3, modulePackages.size());
154        assertEquals("org.apache.turbine.services.template.modules", modulePackages.get(1));
155        assertEquals(1, notModified);
156
157        assertNotNull(screenLoader);
158        assertNotNull(asb);
159        assertNotNull(factory);
160        
161        assertNotNull(userManager);
162        assertNotNull(security);
163        assertNotNull(lt);
164        // although you need to initialize with context in lt.init(getRunData());
165
166    }
167
168    @TurbineRequiredRole({"user","admin"})
169    public void guardedMethoded() {
170        // do nothing
171    }
172
173    @Test
174    public void testRequiredRoleMethodProcess() throws Exception
175    {
176        RunData data = mock(RunData.class);
177        TurbineAccessControlList<?> acl = mock(TurbineAccessControlList.class);
178        Role role = mock(Role.class);
179        when(role.getName()).thenReturn( "user" );
180        // Group group = mock(Group.class);
181        when(acl.hasRole( role.getName() )).thenReturn( Boolean.TRUE );
182        when(data.getACL()).thenReturn(acl );
183
184        Method[] methods = getClass().getMethods();
185        for (Method m : methods) {
186            if (m.getName().equals( "guardedMethoded" )) {
187                assertTrue( AnnotationProcessor.isAuthorized( m, (TurbineAccessControlList<?>)data.getACL(), ConditionType.ANY ));
188                assertFalse( AnnotationProcessor.isAuthorized( m, (TurbineAccessControlList<?>)data.getACL(), ConditionType.COMPOUND ));
189            }
190        }
191    }
192
193    @TurbineRequiredRole({"admin"})
194    public void guardedMethodedAdmin() {
195        // do nothing
196    }
197
198    @Test
199    public void testRequiredRoleAdminMethodProcess() throws Exception
200    {
201        RunData data = mock(RunData.class);
202        TurbineAccessControlList<?> acl = mock(TurbineAccessControlList.class);
203        Role role = mock(Role.class);
204        when(role.getName()).thenReturn( "user" );
205        // Group group = mock(Group.class);
206        when(acl.hasRole( role.getName() )).thenReturn( Boolean.TRUE );
207        when(data.getACL()).thenReturn(acl );
208
209        Method[] methods = getClass().getMethods();
210        for (Method m : methods) {
211            if (m.getName().equals( "guardedMethodedAdmin" )) {
212                assertFalse( AnnotationProcessor.isAuthorized( m, (TurbineAccessControlList<?>)data.getACL(), ConditionType.ANY ));
213            }
214        }
215    }
216
217    public void unguardedMethoded() {
218        // do nothing
219    }
220
221    @Test
222    public void testUnguardedMethodWProcessDefault() throws Exception
223    {
224        RunData data = mock(RunData.class);
225        TurbineAccessControlList<?> acl = mock(TurbineAccessControlList.class);
226        Role role = mock(Role.class);
227        when(role.getName()).thenReturn( "user" );
228        // Group group = mock(Group.class);
229        when(acl.hasRole( role.getName() )).thenReturn( Boolean.FALSE );
230        when(data.getACL()).thenReturn(acl );
231
232        Method[] methods = getClass().getMethods();
233        for (Method m : methods) {
234            if (m.getName().equals( "unguardedMethoded" )) {
235                // default is true, if not annotated
236                assertTrue( AnnotationProcessor.isAuthorized( m, (TurbineAccessControlList<?>)data.getACL(), ConditionType.ANY ));
237            }
238        }
239    }
240
241    //@Disabled("For performance tests only")
242    @Tag("performance") // ignore in surefire, activating seems to be still buggy ?
243    @Test
244    public void testProcessingPerformance() throws TurbineException
245    {
246        long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
247
248        for (int i = 0; i < 100000; i++)
249        {
250            AnnotationProcessor.process(this);
251        }
252
253        System.out.println(System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime);
254    }
255
256}
